channel.title: How to post a snippet
channel.description:
It's as simple as can be. You can post a few bits of code in code tags and call that a topic. All discussion that ensues follows global forum rules. We do not expect any sort of explanation of your code, other than its purpose. You don't have to explain any detailed aspects of it in the slightest. Thorough and complete tutorials should be posted in the parent board.
Post any questions or concerns regarding this board below or in the suggestions forum.

item.title: How to post a snippet
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
